dataMapping.title: Integrated Cross-Channel Strategy
dataMapping.subtitle: Strategic channel orchestration with creative and timing alignment

channels.primaryLabel: Channel name (e.g., 'Connected TV', 'Paid Social', 'Programmatic Display', 'Paid Search', 'Audio')
channels.description: Channel strategy and role in integrated campaign
channels.currentValue: Current performance (e.g., '4.8x ROAS', '2.5M impressions', '+32% brand lift')
channels.targetValue: Performance target (e.g., '5.5x ROAS', '3.0M impressions', '+40% brand lift')
channels.forecastedValue: Projected performance (e.g., '5.2x ROAS', '2.8M impressions', '+36% brand lift')
insights: Channel performance insights and strategic role
channels.creativeFormat: Recommended creative format (e.g., '15s video', 'Carousel ads', 'Responsive display')
channels.audienceAlignment: Target audience segments (e.g., 'Brand Advocates, High-Intent Prospects')
synergies: Cross-channel synergies and integration points (e.g., 'CTV drives search lift', 'Social amplifies display')

crossChannelInsights: How channels work together to amplify campaign impact
